title: What are good negative things to say?

replies.body:
For Real ?  Your asking what?   

What you can get away with saying, and not get punished ?

People like you are all over the board and it is past time someone does or says or watches these things! 

REDS, I Have been off the boards for this very reason...If any of you want to talk to me please do!!

____

And a big get it together GD!   Many of you could teach people how to act instead of :  making it more difficult!  I know so many good people lets try to make the game better:)  Got a problem with what I say then lets do it like always and talk to me Now or Help...

Thanks My Friends ;)

Sarcasm
passive agressive
non nonsensical suggestions


If I were you I'd swim in a vat of lime green pudding

>
> Sarcasm
> passive agressive
> non nonsensical suggestions

passive aggressive is banable.

>
> passive aggressive is banable.

Sorry
Sarcasm-passive aggressive-nonsensical suggestion
If I were you I'd swim in a vat of lime green pudding

No aggressive is bannable
Passive is not
there is no middle ground

> [{quoted}](name=Magical Player,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Pty5zBo9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T06:24:06.218+0000)

Thats too soft

Just say 
or is it
after everything

>What are good negative things to say?

Why do you ask?
Be like "I heard you and Christina were talkin bad about Jason behind his back. Be there at 3:00. Purple times."

*Player Dies*

"Nice play (Insert Player's Name Here)"

*Player is feeding*

"Man this (Insert Player's Name Here) is carrying this team"

*Player if flaming you*

"Wah"
